member.name: D3D11_AUTHENTICATED_CONFIGURE_OUTPUT
member.summary: Contains the response from the method.

member.name: D3D11_AUTHENTICATED_CONFIGURE_OUTPUT.omac
member.summary: A structure that contains a Message Authentication Code (MAC) of the data. The driver uses AES-based one-key CBC MAC (OMAC) to calculate this value for the block of data that appears after this structure member.

member.name: D3D11_AUTHENTICATED_CONFIGURE_OUTPUT.ConfigureType
member.summary: A GUID that specifies the command. For a list of GUIDs, see .

member.name: D3D11_AUTHENTICATED_CONFIGURE_OUTPUT.hChannel
member.summary: A handle to the authenticated channel.

member.name: D3D11_AUTHENTICATED_CONFIGURE_OUTPUT.ReturnCode
member.summary: The result code for the command.
